attributes.action: Cancel the 100th Anniversary of the start of World War One.
attributes.additional_details:
To in any form remember the start of world war one which was a crime against the people is not worthy of 50 million pounds of Government planned spending.To commemorate the end of a war is partly acceptable but never the start of one.........the announcement by the Prime Minister sounded like winning the Olympic Games all over again.
50 million pounds of State money can be better spent.
